title: You might soon be able to co-author tweets with other Twitter accounts
content:
Twitter has been actively developing and implementing new features lately. Some changes remain exclusive to Twitter Blue, while other ones are available for free and paid users alike. What once started as a basic platform for sharing information in under 140 characters has now evolved into a full-fledged service. Users can now engage in live

The post You might soon be able to co-author tweets with other Twitter accounts appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Twitter might soon allow users to co-author tweets with other accounts. The feature is currently still under development.
